body.name: ApoloSign 10" Tablet, Android 13 with Octa-core Processor, 8GB&64GB Storage(Expand to 128GB), Dual Camera 5MP, WiFi 6&Bluetooth 5.0, Metal Casing Upgrade, 5000mAh Battery, Google GMS Certified
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 6 hrs
features: Upgraded Metal Exterior — Experience sophistication in design with the android tablet's upgraded metal exterior. The sleek and durable metal casing adds a touch of elegance to your device, making a statement wherever you go.

Ample Expandable Storage to 128GB — Store, organize, and access your windows tablet files effortlessly with the generous 8GB(4GB+4GB Expansion)&64GB storage configuration. Need more space? Expand up to 128GB for limitless storage possibilities.

Peak Performance Unleashed — Experience the next level of performance with the ApoloSign Android 13. Packed with an octa-core processor, it effortlessly handles multitasking and demanding applications. Elevate your digital journey with the tablet pc-- where power meets perfection.

Fast Connectivity with WiFi 6 and Bluetooth 5.0 — Enjoy lightning-fast internet access with WiFi 6 technology. Plus, connect seamlessly to a variety of devices with Bluetooth 5.0, enhancing the versatility of your tablet.

Extended Battery Life — The robust 5000mAh battery ensures your tableta keeps up with your activities, providing 5-8 hours of continuous use. Stay entertained and productive without the worry of running out of power.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: More powerful, faster for it Increase productivity with our powerful tablet. This sleek device with an octa-core processor with Android 13 combines innovation and functionality for an enhanced experience.

Embracing the Poetry of Metal The new metal casing is modern and elegant. The equipment is equipped with strong performance, combined with beautiful design, is your innovative and stylish endorsement!
10.1-inch FHD Display Awaits Every detail comes to life, making the tablet the perfect companion for unlimited exploration. The crisp, vivid display makes your visual adventures even more exciting.
5000 mAh Battery Life Large 5000 mAh battery lasts for 5-8 hours of smooth experience. Whether you're on the go or exploring, the long-lasting battery life ensures an enjoyable experience.
Expand Your Horizons and Memory 8(4+4)&64GB attribute configuration.Expandable up to 128GB capacity for unlimited freedom. Ensure every moment and every app finds its place in your digital world.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use!
reviews.reviewText: I needed something for my young daughter to do some school work on and to be able to easily travel with for entertainment and this has surpassed my expectations! My 3 year old is able to have books read to her through her school apps and not have to fight with a large, heavy tablet. It’s small size is great to throw in my bag for travel as well! The battery life has been wonderful and is lasting a long time. I’m not an original user of Android but the ease of use, how fast it runs, and the clear picture quality while watching movies makes me want to switch things over! I would definitely recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Wow. The resolution on this product is way more than I imagined. It’s crystal clear and sharp! So far the battery life is longer than expected as well. Pretty easy to set up and get started. Using this mainly for picture editing and making albums. Going to try to do more with it since it’s been so easy to use. ;))For the price, This is a pretty good find!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars For the price, not bad
reviews.reviewText: I gave it four stars only because the sound is really bad. As in, too low to listen to without headphones or a bluetooth speaker. I got it because (A) it was a good price, and (B) to watch a few movies on and read. It's nice for reading. The screen is big enough. Movies and shows look pretty good actually, but I had to download a volume booster app just to be able to listen to them, and those apps destroy the sound quality if turned up too high.Overall, it's not a bad product for the price. I didn't want to spend a ton of money on something just to do a couple things on. It's lightweight. Battery seems to last. The touch is responsive. The image is very nice. Just wish the sound was better. (I haven't tried it with headphones or an external speaker yet.)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Fine for what I need it for
reviews.reviewText: I bought this because i got a really good price. Came well packaged. I'm mainly going to use it to watch TV in bed so I don't bother my hubby! It will definitely serve its purpose for that as the picture quality is adequate, not great but certainly watchable.Couple of things to be aware of if you plan on using it for school, work ect... it's pretty heavy, as in, noticeably. The volume is barely adequate and any outside noise makes that almost unacceptable. The volume is improved with earbuds but I don't believe it would be sufficient to use on an airplane as I would like. This might be the deal breaker for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid processing power
reviews.reviewText: Great to watch shows and movies and do light admin tasks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Screen froze upon first boot up and rebooting doesn't work
reviews.reviewText: Just once I would like to order a product from Amazon that worked the way it's supposed to out of the box. This garbage does not. As with most amazon products, I've noticed that they sent crap that doesn't function properly or is otherwise defective. Then conveniently for them its difficult and burdensome to return, making Bezos more unjustified enrichment in the tax-free billions. This is why people hate billionaires. After the initial screen this piece of defective offal froze and became unresponsive. Shocker......... Amazon please do better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Battery life SUCKS
reviews.reviewText: never had a tablet die within 2 hours especially being brand new 👎🏽

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: So I love using my tablet to read my books off of kindle. Its also alows me to watch shows and play games that I wouldnt be able to on a kindle tablet. Battery life is amazing and screen brightness is very adjustable. So happy with my purchase.
